name: Fate of the Ancient
description:
Glory Awaits

Smash your way through hordes of enemies to prove yourself worthy of Valhalla in this hack-and-slash adventure game.

Prove Yourself

Armed with a hammer, collect magic runestones and defeat your enemies. Steel yourself in the trials and rise to Valhalla! Or channel your rage and go Berserk!

Slay Your Enemies

Bash the undead or charge your hammer and smite your foes! With a range of magic runestones, harness the power of the elements to shake up the battleground! No matter how you play, your combat style is yours to choose.

Endure the trials and the path to Valhalla shall be revealed.
